article_title: Medicare, Commercial Insurers Agree On Uniform Health Quality Measures

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: In a move to simplify the way quality of healthcare is measured in the U.S., the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services said they have launched a set of core quality measures that both the government and commercial insurers have agreed they will use in seven key areas. It's a significant [...]
